title: News: Foals Unveil Cryptic Website
content:
Here’s a brainteaser for you, what has five letters and is in some way relevant to Foals? The UK indie outfit have launched a new website with a cryptic code on the front page, consisting of five spaces, that must be filled with letters or numbers, in order to access a hidden part to the page. With their new album Holy Fire out 11 Feb 2013, it’s highly likely to be somehow related to that, but aside from that, we’re stumped.

EDIT: Turns out the code is HRCPT and accesses a looped audio file.

EDIT: Or use VEKSD to access a remix of Inhaler by Tom Vek.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
